backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, voice models, and conversion jobs with authorization checks and storage mixins. Provides creation, upload, and job-tracking logic using maps and timestamps.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report declaring type 'feature_evidence_report' with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing components, pages, hooks, and configuration details.
frontend/.env: Environment file containing a real Replicate API token for AI voice conversion.
frontend/.env.example: Sample environment file showing where to place a Replicate API token for local configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining extensive warm-toned OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint with root div and script loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in theme provider and Toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper with navigation, main content container, and footer attribution.
frontend/src/components/AppNav.tsx: Responsive navigation header with logo, route links, and mobile bottom nav, highlighting the active path.
frontend/src/components/AudioUploadAndSu: Form for selecting a model and uploading audio, performing Replicate preflight check and creating conversion jobs with progress updates.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Identity-based guard that shows a sign‑in prompt or children based on Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Renders the app's logo image with fixed sizing.
frontend/src/components/EmptyStateHero.t: Generic empty‑state component showing optional image, title, description, and action.
frontend/src/components/InlineAlert.tsx: Displays a styled inline alert box with variant-based colors and icons.
frontend/src/components/JobsTable.tsx: Fetches, sorts, and displays conversion jobs in a responsive grid using JobStatusCard components.
frontend/src/components/JobStatusCard.ts: Shows status, playback, and download controls for a conversion job with cleanup and error handling.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and a styled button.
frontend/src/components/ModelSelect.tsx: Loads voice models and renders a select dropdown for choosing one with fallback states.
Displays user voice models with delete confirmation and creation date info.
frontend/src/components/VoiceModelUpload: Form for uploading voice models with validation, progress tracking, and error display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity, auto-invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useConversionJobs.ts: Provides hooks to fetch, create, and monitor voice conversion jobs with backend integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication and login state using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useModelNameLookup.ts: Returns a lookup function that maps a model ID to its model name using fetched voice models.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceModels.ts: Defines hooks to fetch, upload, and delete voice models via an actor, including progress tracking and react-query integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS base styles, theme variables, dark mode colors, and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CreateCoverPage.tsx: Loads user voice models and shows the audio upload flow for creating AI covers, redirecting if no models exist.
frontend/src/pages/JobsHistoryPage.tsx: Displays the user's conversion job history or an empty state, gated by authentication.
frontend/src/pages/VoiceModelsPage.tsx: Allows uploading and listing voice models, showing an empty state when none exist.
frontend/src/services/voiceConversion.ts: Implements client-side voice conversion using the Replicate API with error handling and audio data preparation.
frontend/src/utils/actorErrorMessage.ts: Parses and simplifies backend agent error messages into user-friendly text.
Downloads an ExternalBlob as an audio file by converting it to a Blob and triggering a browser download.
frontend/src/utils/fileToBytes.ts: Converts a File to a Uint8Array with a size check and FileReader-based reading.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes project state, known issues, and pending feature requests related to configuring and validating a Replicate API token.
